author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Marinated Anchovies, Salted Almonds & Olives recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Marinated Anchovies, Salted Almonds & Olives Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 250g mixed green and black olives, unstoned
2 fresh red chillies, deseeded and very finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Put the olives in a small bowl with the garlic, orange zest, chillies, and peppercorns. Drizzle over the oil, give the olives a stir, then leave to marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour.
Meanwhile, put the anchovies and their oil in a small serving bowl. Add the garlic, dill, and vinegar, season with black pepper, then stir to combine. Leave to marinate for at least 30 minutes.

While the olives and anchovies are marinating, put the almonds in a small frying pan and heat gently. Sprinkle over the salt, toss to coat, then cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes, or until lightly toasted.
Transfer the almonds, olives, and anchovies to individual small serving bowls, or one serving dish, and serve at room temperature with drinks.
